item.title: Royalty smart contract in TEAL for Algorand NFTs
item.description: A quick note on Uncopied.art In February 2021, we started to demo a new kind of Certificate of Authenticity (CoA) to several artists, galleries and museums. Our prototype combined a chirograph and an Algorand Standard Asset (ASA) to secure the origin and unicity of a physical or digital artwork. The prototype worked great. We got some positive feedback. We could feel strong expectation in the Algorand community, as we were hoping to launch in May 2021.
